p: THC and CBD are at the center of othersâ€™ attention. It is a wonder why we have never heard too much of the other cannabinoids. Some of other well-known phytocannabinoids are shown in Figure 1, which may have possible medical effects including cannabinol (CBN), cannabigerol (CBG), cannabichromene (CBC), tetrahydrocannabivarin (THCV), cannabidivarin (CBDV), and cannabinodiol (CBND), cannabinidiol (CBDL), cannabielsoin (CBE), cannabitriol (CBT), cannabicyclol (CBL), and other minor compounds ( Figure 1). Some of these cannabinoids such as THC, CBN, and CBDL are psychoactive, whereas CBD, CBC, and CBG are not [ 21, 50, 76, 77, 78].
